data.eml:eml: Orientopius Fischer (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Opiinae) new for continental China, with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Achterberg, Cornelis van, Li, Xi-Ying, Tan, Ji-Cai (2012): Orientopius Fischer (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Opiinae) new for continental China, with description of a new species. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 29: 63-72, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.29.3145, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.29.3145
